alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 29 at 3:43PM EDT until April 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest concern will come during the high tide cycle late Saturday evening. Expect inundation of 1.5 to 3 feet on normally dry ground near the shoreline.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
